msContents.summary:
A pharmaceutical dictionary by Édouard Ariel, in three sections:
Dictionary, French-Portuguese-Tamil-Hindi-Telugu
Dictionary, French-Tamil
Dictionary, French-Tamil-Portuguese

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Marbled recto verso. Shelfmark on the recto.
2 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso. f[1]r marbled. BnF shelfmark (f[2]r).
126 folios = Dictionary. 12 + 10 + 93 + [1] folios (U1a + U1b + U1c + U1d). 220 x 295 mm.
12 folios = Dictionary, French-Portuguese-Tamil-Hindi-Telugu. Library Arabic foliation1 1-112. 5-column tables.
10 folios = Dictionary, French-Tamil. Library Arabic foliation1 13-21, 22 (library Arabic foliation1. 2-column tables.
94 folios = French-Tamil-Portuguese. Original pagination 1-186. Library Arabic foliation2 2-104, 115-196. 3-column tables.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No pagination. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
2 folios = back guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso. f[2v] marbled.

decoNote.desc: Emblem of the Société Asiatique in golden letters.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Written by Edouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Edouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 26.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 38r, no. 140.
Vinson, Julien (1867). Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls. Corrected proofreadings printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 38, no. 140.
Vinson, Julien (n.d.). BnF Indien 1062, f54r, no. 139 140.
James, Gregory (2000). Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
